incidents.name: [BHS7][Dedicated Servers] - Rack B715A03
incidents.message: An incident is in progress on our Baremetal offer. It has temporarily affected the Availability. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 23/10/2024 13:30 UTC Service impact : Public Network in the rack B715A03 is unavailable. Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it. Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident. We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.
